DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability immunogenicity 4 different formulation HR5I vaccine ( Haemophilus influenzae type b conjugate , recombinant hepatitis B surface antigen , diphtheria , tetanus , 5-component acellular pertussis , inactivate poliovirus Types 1 , 2 , 3 ) . The primary hypothesis least 1 4 formulation HR5I administer primary series 2 , 3 , 4 month age acceptable ( similar target rate ) respect Postdose 3 antibody response antigen .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Test Safety Effectiveness Investigational Vaccine Infants ( V419-002 )
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomize 4 arm : AR51 ( 12 , 10 ) : arm receiving vaccine formulation contain 12 mcg polyribosylribitol phosphate ( PRP ) conjugate tetanus toxoid ( PRP-T ) 10 mcg Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) PR51 ( 3 , 10 ) : arm receiving vaccine formulation contain 3 mcg PRP conjugate outer membrane protein complex Neisseria meningitides ( PRP-OMPC ) 10 mcg HBsAg PR51 ( 6 , 10 ) : arm receiving vaccine formulation contain 6 mcg PRP-OMPC 10 mcg HBsAg PR51 ( 6 , 15 ) : arm receiving vaccine formulation contain 6 mcg PRP-OMPC 15 mcg HBsAg
DOC.criteria: Healthy infant 2 month age receive prior vaccination Haemophilus influenzae type b ( Hib ) , hepatitis B , Diptheria/Pertussis/Tetanus ( DPT ) , Polio Exclusion Criteria : Documented HIV infection ( child mother ) Documented HBsAgseropositivity ( child mother ) History invasive Hib disease , hepatitis B , diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , poliovirus infection History seizure disorder , developmental delay , neurologic disorder Underlying medical condition inborn error metabolism , failure thrive , major congenital abnormality require surgery Prior anticipate receipt immune globulin , blood , blood product Known hypersensitivity component investigational vaccine administer protocol Any history condition would exclude child receive vaccine administer protocol Any condition , opinion investigator , may interfere evaluation study objective
